Who We Are

Serving Tulsa
& Green Country

Tiger Electrical Services is a locally owned and operated electrical contracting firm based in Broken Arrow, Oklahoma, serving all of the greater Tulsa area and Green Country. We specialize in all phases of the electrical industry.

With well-equipped and trained electricians, we do electrical service work and new construction for some of the largest healthcare facilities, retirement communities, commercial real estate properties, and disaster restoration companies in the state of Oklahoma.

Years Experience

Local & Dedicated

Our Story

With well over 20 years of experience in the trade, owners Corey Wooldridge and Kevin Mantegani built Tiger Electrical Services to serve their families, their community, and to deliver true electrical craftsmanship. No project is too big or small.

Our Advantage

What Makes
Us Different

01 / Direct Communication

No Middleman. No Miscommunication.

Our service platform was designed to minimize the gap between you, the customer, and the actual electrician doing the job. The issue most people have with any electrical service company is miscommunication between the customer's request and what the electricians are told they will be doing.

This results in electricians showing up to work with the wrong materials, adding more time and cost to you. If you're in need of any electrical service, give us a call — we'd appreciate the chance to be YOUR ELECTRICIAN.

02 / Design Build

True Craftsmanship. Every Project.

Design build or remodeling an existing facility is one of the major trends in construction right now. Tiger Electrical Services is second to none in the ability to integrate your needs into a set of plans and complete the electrical project with true craftsmanship and customer satisfaction.

We are well-trained residential and commercial electricians here to help you complete your project, no matter how large or small. Contact us — we'd appreciate the opportunity to be YOUR ELECTRICIAN.

What We Do

Our Services

Whether it is your home or business, we are YOUR ELECTRICIAN.

Commercial Electrical

Full-service commercial electrical contracting for businesses of all sizes, from office buildings to industrial facilities.

Emergency Service

When electrical issues can't wait, our team responds fast.

Residential Service & Repair

Home electrical service, repair, panel upgrades, and smart home integrations.

New Construction

Complete electrical systems for new residential and commercial builds from foundation to finish.

Commercial & Residential Remodels

Remodeling your space? We'll integrate new electrical seamlessly.

Exterior & Interior Lighting

Lighting design and installation for ambiance, safety, and efficiency.

Data / Telecom

Data cabling, telecom infrastructure, and structured network wiring.

Design Build Services

We integrate your vision into a set of plans and complete the electrical project with true craftsmanship and customer satisfaction.

Electrical Service Upgrades

Panel upgrades and service modernization to meet today's power demands.

Electrical Estimating

Detailed, accurate estimates so you know exactly what to expect.

Electrical Inspections

Comprehensive inspections and reports for buyers, sellers, and property managers.

About the Owners

Tiger Electrical Services wants your overall experience to be professional and to exceed the industry standard. We are not your typical service company. We are licensed, bonded, and insured — so call us today!
